attributes.action: Postpone council tax payments for two months due to Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: It will enable households, particularly the self-employed to reduce their outgoings at a time of extreme financial stress.
attributes.background: I propose that the council tax that is due to commence in April 2020 be postponed by two months and then is paid right up until March 2021 instead.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
